Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.createFulltextIndex(Collection<String>, FulltextIndexOptions)
    use #ensureFulltextIndex(Collection, FulltextIndexOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.createGeoIndex(Collection<String>, GeoIndexOptions)
    use #ensureGeoIndex(Collection, GeoIndexOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.createHashIndex(Collection<String>, HashIndexOptions)
    use ArangoCollection.ensureHashIndex(Iterable, HashIndexOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.createPersistentIndex(Collection<String>, PersistentIndexOptions)
    use #ensurePersistentIndex(Collection, PersistentIndexOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoCollection.createSkiplistIndex(Collection<String>, SkiplistIndexOptions)
    use #ensureSkiplistIndex(Collection, SkiplistIndexOptions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.host(String)
    will be removed in version 4.2.0 use ArangoDB.Builder.host(String, int) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.Builder.port(Integer)
    will be removed in version 4.2.0 use ArangoDB.Builder.host(String, int) instead
    com.arangodb.util.ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, boolean)
    use ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Options) instead
    com.arangodb.util.ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, boolean, boolean)
    use ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Options) instead
    com.arangodb.util.ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Type)
    use ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Options) instead
    com.arangodb.util.ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Type, boolean)
    use ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Options) instead
    com.arangodb.util.ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Type, Map<String, Object>)
    use ArangoSerializer.serialize(Object, Options) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.updateUserDefaultCollectionAccess(String, Permissions)
    user ArangoDB.grantDefaultCollectionAccess(String, Permissions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDatabase.updateUserDefaultCollectionAccess(String, Permissions)
    use ArangoDatabase.grantDefaultCollectionAccess(String, Permissions) instead
    com.arangodb.ArangoDB.updateUserDefaultDatabaseAccess(String, Permissions)
    use ArangoDB.grantDefaultDatabaseAccess(String, Permissions) instead
